Yes I do agree a move towards renewable is definitely the trend given the rise in companies that offer these services and products. It will happen over time. I do not disagree that resources are finite and if we can move away to infinite or renewable it would be in the best interests of everyone. My problem is with the government subsidizing or funding these things under the veil of alarmism. There is no immediate danger. Everyone is for clean energy but not a the expense of the economy or government subsidy. Have a good weekend yourself.

Charlie Hebdo never claimed to be a tasteful publication. It has better things to do. It has been a loud, raucous voice for freedom --from religious bigotry, and hypocrisy of all kinds. That's why they were attacked by religious bigots. That's why PEN is right to give them an award -- for guts, for making use of freedom of speech instead of self censorship.
